parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.32

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Positions
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Render Time Scope

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Converts position from world space to object model space in [[Simulation vs Render Time Scope|render time scope]].

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> object [[worldToModelVisual]] worldPosition

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> worldPosition: [[Array]] - format [[PositionAGL]] or [[Position2D]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - [[PositionRelative]]
		  

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_relPos = myObject [[worldToModelVisual]] [0,0,0];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_relPos = [[player]] [[worldToModelVisual]] [[position]] car;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> <code>_relPos = car [[worldToModelVisual]] [12000, 5000];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x4</name>=<value> <code>_relPos = unit [[worldToModelVisual]] [[position]] tank;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[worldToModel]], [[vectorWorldToModelVisual]], [[modelToWorldVisual]], [[modelToWorld]]
</value></part></template></root>
